name: Bolt.new
description: Bolt.new is an AI-powered web development platform by StackBlitz that allows users to create, edit, and deploy full-stack web applications directly in their browser. It supports frameworks like React and Vue, integrates with npm, and uses WebContainers for a seamless coding experience. Features include AI-driven code generation, real-time collaboration, and instant deployment to platforms like Netlify. Ideal for rapid prototyping and development without complex setups.
